definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: sack, only Ge 42–Ge 44; —´[[א]] constr. Ge 44:2, Ge 44:12; sf. [[אַמְתַּחְתִּי]] Ge 42:28, [[אַמְתַּחְתּוֹ]] Ge 42:27 + 2 t.; pl. cstr. [[אַמְתְּחׂת]] Ge 44:1; sf. [[אַמְתְּחׂתֵינוּ]] Ge 43:18 + 3 t.; [[אַמְתְּחׂתֵיכֶם]] Ge 43:12, Ge 43:23; —sack(s) in wh. brethren of Joseph carried corn from Egypt; in phr. ´[[בְּטִי אַמ]] Ge 42:27 in the mouth of the sack, so Ge 43:12, Ge 43:21, Ge 44:1, Ge 44:2, Ge 44:8; elsewhere Ge 42:28, Ge 43:18, Ge 43:21, Ge 43:22, Ge 43:23, Ge 44:1, Ge 44:11, Ge 44:11, Ge 44:12 (all J).
